ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest interview...
ygData.msgSnippet: You cannot whine about monks being nerfed. Bards have been nerfed on almost every patch. Roll with it and deal. Monks still rock. I would like to hear from the
ygData.messageBody:
You cannot whine about monks being nerfed. Bards have been nerfed on almost every patch. Roll with it and deal. Monks still rock.
 
I would like to hear from the part of the dev team that deals with the classes, and how the deal with what they envision for the classes.
 
And please, who coined the phrase, "Working as intended." That kills me!
 
Awulfie A'Mused
----- Original Message -----
From: Kent King
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, December 29, 2003 7:54 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest interview...

LOL, not sure the name, but I'd love to hear from who
the frock made the decision to nerf the monk class out
of general usefulness.  Brad?  I have a message for
him not suitable for minors who might read this board,
but you can picture what it might be after all of the
time I have invested in my monk. </em grins evilly>

Quwi Changkane Grandmaster of Fenin Ro

--- goldleader <swany0916@...> wrote:
> I'm planning an interview with a developer or
> producer for
> Everquest.  Who do you guys think would make an
> interesting interview?
>
> Any questions you'd like answered?
>
> Thanks,
>
> David
> VideoGameRadio.com
